title: Walnut and oat chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['100g walnuts', '75g rye flour', '60g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '100g oats', '200g finely chopped dried figs', '175g mini dark chocolate chips', '170g butter, at room temperature', '140g soft brown sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
